title: Personalized Marketing Message Generation Integrated with Twilio
author: Gopagoni Jyothika ,Devi Parvathy Nair, Vaibhav Simikeri
description: Generated custom marketing messages tailored to individual customers based on the customer data such as name, age ,income ,hobbies ,preferences and specific offers provided by the bank. These messages are dynamically crafted to resonate with each recipient, increasing engagement and integrated with Twilio's messaging platform to deliver these messages via SMS.
